talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$White Dragon Iona$
Umm~~ {user_nick}, did you say you were going to meet King Cassius?

$White Dragon Iona$
I will stay here so come back when you're done!
I will talk to the other adventurers too~!
(Iona waves his hand. Meet King Cassius at Saint Haven Royal Castle.)

$King Cassius$
My loyal {user_nick}… What is wrong?
You look so serious…

$King Cassius$
Come on, tell me.(Cassius takes a peek at Duke Stuart)

${user_nick}$
Your highness, the Red Dragon Feder and the Dragon Followers are trying to destroy the Monolith.

$King Cassius$
Wh-what...? Monolith? What is a Monolith?

${user_nick}$
It's a place that links our world to the Goddess's dream. If something happens there, our world may be destroyed.

$Duke Stuart$
Hah, what are you talking about…(Stuart sneers) What nonsense! I heard that you are a close friend of his highness, but you're trying to bewitch him with absurdities... And you're even using the name of King Feder who founded our country.

${user_nick}$
What I'm saying is the truth. Two dragons are also on their way to the Monolith to stop him. There were many Dragon Followers at Anu Arendel, and they tried to use the poison that they used in Calderock Village again.

$Duke Stuart$
…You are spouting more and more nonsense! Guards, drag this kid out! How dare you try to fool his highness with ridiculous rumours. You must have lost your senses after being treated too well by the king.

$King Cassius$
W-wait uncle! B-but {user_nick} has helped us all along….
L-let's listen to him a little more….

$Duke Stuart$
(Stuart is looking at you with dismay and discontent)
Your highness, I'm just awed by your benevolence.
Continue whatever you have to say, but keep in mind that you will be punished for any impudence.

${user_nick}$
I came across the Dragon Followers at Anu Arendel. Among them were the traitor Ignacio and other Apostles. They disrupted the Elves' Conclave and got a hold of the relics. Geraint also appeared at the scene and helped to push them back.

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
Urgh, the Monolith?!
What kind of an idiot is messing with that!

$Duke Stuart$
…I hope what happened 50 years ago will not be repeated.

$General Douglas$
Troubles never end.
We should stay strong at times like this.
(Douglas looks determined)

$Terrence Terramai$
…I'm just praying for the Goddess's protection.

$Terrence Terramai$
Pardon me for interrupting, but everythig is true. I have already received the report that the Dragon Followers and the Red Dragon have appeared. When we think about why the Red Dragon has appeared at Anu Arendel which is full of powerful Elves, it is most likely that he is aiming for the Monolith.

$Duke Stuart$
(Stuart openly shows that he is displeased)The Monolith. Is there really such a thing, Kayleen?

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
I've seen it in books before. It was some sort of a medium. I don't think that adventurer is lying. The letter from Fairystar also points to that…(Kayleen glances at the piece of paper in her hand)
But why is the Red Dragon interested in the Monolith? What can he find there?

$Terrence Terramai$
The Monolith is the pathway to the world of unknown. The Ancient Dragon is currently protecting the place with all her powers. Maybe there is something powerful that does not exist in this world.

$General Douglas$
Wait a minute… then are the Dragon Followers going to become more powerful than they already are? We must stop that! It has already been proven from many battles that they are not easy opponents. Your highness, we should not let them have their way, whatever it is they are doing.

$Duke Stuart$
But what can we do about the Monolith? Didn't you say that people like us can even go near it?

$Terrence Terramai$
Though we can't go near the Monolith, we can stop the Dragon Followers from reaching that place. It would be better than doing nothing.

$Duke Stuart$
Outrageous! Everyone is trusting that young adventurer. Aren't we having a hard time fighting even the monsters right now? We don't have enough resources to deal with the Dragon Followers too.

$Terrence Terramai$
Are you going to complain that we don't have enough resources even when this world starts to crumble after something happens to the Monolith?
Your highness, what do you think about this matter?

$Duke Stuart$
You have a rough tongue, Terramai. Even if you may be one of the Six Heroes…

$Terrence Terramai$
My question was for His Highness, not you. Your Highness, {user_nick} has always tried so hard for this kingdom and the people. {user_nick} wouldn't be standing here just to spread some childish rumours.

$Terrence Terramai$
We can also send a messenger to the Elves and find out more about the situation and whether our help is really needed. Please decide, your Highness.

$King Cassius$
Erm I…(Cassius glances at Stuart like he is asking for help then turns away and thinks for a while)

$King Cassius$
(Speaking in voice full of determination)I… agree with…. Terramai. We shall send a messenger to the Elves… a-and… then I will decide….

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
I will send a messenger. A sorceress would arrive at Anu Arendel much faster than an ordinary soldier.

$King Cassius$
(His eyes widen in suprise)
Oh… Th-thank you Kayleen…

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
(Frowns a little)
It would be better to thank that adventurer and Cidel Fairystar in Lotus Marsh instead. There are piles of information to be researched on, so if we have come to a conclusion, shall we call it a day?

$Duke Stuart$
(Stuart stares with scary eyes)
Very well, your highnes. {user_nick}, come I have something to say.

(Talk to Duke Stuart)

$Duke Stuart$
You almost looked like sworn brothers with that Terramai, {user_nick}. What are you up to?

${user_nick}$
I'm not up to anything. The Red Dragon is really trying to destroy the Monolith.

$Duke Stuart$
(Stuart's face is full of confusion and mixed feelings)
Oh yeah? How deeply are you involved in this matter. You're something to be involved in such a great matter as an ordinary adventurer.
So, are you going to gather other adventurers like what happened in the past?

$Duke Stuart$
Let me make this clear. We are not going to give any support to make you the one and only hero. People always don't know who is supporting this world from crumbling, and they only devote themselves to one hero.

$Duke Stuart$
The mistake has cost us dearly 50 years ago. It's a painful memory for both the Royal Castle and the citizens.
And also, you called the Red Dragon by the name Feder. Is he really the king who founded our country, or someone else with the same name?

${user_nick}$
I'm not really sure… But to be able to possess both the Red Dragon and Black Dragon jewels at the same time, that person is not someone ordinary.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But Feder is someone of the past.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
…Is that so. But don't mention his name if you can, or else you might stir up the people. Think about how despairing it would be for the people to find out the king who had founded this nation is coming to destroy it.

$Duke Stuart$
…Yeah. But I'm sure there are people who worship King Feder for his invincible power.
We shouldn't let the people be stirred. I don't want rumours about the Monolith or the Red Dragon from spreading either. {user_nick}.

$Duke Stuart$
…Yes, he is someone of the past. But devotion for heroes transcends time. We have to stop whatever that might stir up the people.
I don't want rumours about the Monolith or the Red Dragon from spreading. {user_nick}.

$Duke Stuart$
…I hoped you could lead the king to the right way, but… It's not going as well as I wished, {user_nick}. That's all I have to say. Go and talk to Terramai.
(Talk to Terrence Terramai)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He told me not to spread the rumour about the Monolith and Feder.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
…Hurhur, did Stuart give you a scolding?

$Terrence Terramai$
…That's likely of him. I was quite forceful just now but… I'm quite relieved that his highness finally is thinking for himself without turning to Stuart.

$Terrence Terramai$
…Hmm I see. It's unlikely of him to let you go without words of caution.

${user_nick}$
Thank you for helping me out just now.

$Terrence Terramai$
I just conveyed my thoughts. I couldn't stay still when I saw your determined face.
Since you have successfully done your job, wait for the news of the messenger.

${user_nick}$
Alright. (Go back to Anu Arendel and tell Iona that everything worked out well)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Stand quietly by his side until he notices you)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…(He is deep in his thoughts looking rather serious)

$White Dragon Iona$
Oh, {user_nick}… How did it go? Did they agree to help?

${user_nick}$
Yes! It was successful! Now the Royal Castle will send someone to the Elder.
I'm sure he will agree to help too!

$White Dragon Iona$
I see. I met many adventurers and they all agreed to help too!
Everyone tried the best to help. (Iona gives a satisfactory nod)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah I'm quite eloquent. I'm quite smart too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…I kind of understand why Geraint trusted the power of the humans.
Hehe, you're a great fragment of Ancient, {user_nick}.
A small dragon like you can go and convince all the humans. It's amazing.
(Iona looks proud of you)

$White Dragon Iona$
…Hehe is it? Erm… I have something to ask you….
Can you come to the Forest of Waiting Noon?
I want to talk to you alone.

${user_nick}$
Okay, I'll see you there.
(Go to the Forest of Waiting Noon and meet White Dragon Iona)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Oh you're here! Hehe actually I still can't believe that there is a smaller jewel than me and that it is taking a human form! You said something about experiment before. Are there many others like you in this world?

${user_nick}$
(Tell him briefly about what happened in the future and the clones)

$White Dragon Iona$
(Iona's eyes widen)
Wow no way… Is it possible to divide the jewel manually?
And that's 50 years in the future? Does this world still exist 50 years later? Hey, does that mean that we will win?

${user_nick}$
…I don't know. History has already changed. The history that I know may not be true anymore.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's a decision I made for myself. I don't regret it.</html>
<html>I don't have time for any of that.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
But… then this is the past for you? This wasn't your world to begin with?
Ancient's fragment… you must have been lonely fighting alone.
Didn't you feel lonely?

$White Dragon Iona$
Wow {user_nick}. That's really brave of you. Just like the Ancient Dragon….
Oh, {user_nick} , do you have any missions?

${user_nick}$
Of course, though I only got to know about it recently,
my mission is to [Protect all the lives in Lagendia].

$White Dragon Iona$
…So you didn't know about it from the beginning.
Well, you got the Ancient's mission even though you're a fragment.
Although everyone looks different, Ancient Dragon is Ancient Dragon….
(Iona smiles)

$White Dragon Iona$
…If we met a little earlier, would you have had Ancient's memories? Then I could have played with you… doing things like making a snowman or snowfights.

${user_nick}$
It's all playing with snow.
We can play with more things in the future.
Lagendia has many places other than Hafling which has nothing but snow.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Yeah but, the next place we meet will be at Hafling.
(Iona looks down)

${user_nick}$
What?! What are you talking about?

$White Dragon Iona$
…I told you before that I can protect you at Monolith. But I can only protect one person. I can't do more than that.

$White Dragon Iona$
…But all the adventurers I met were kind-hearted and courageous. They all wanted to fight at the Monolith. I want to give them the power and chance. The power and chance for them to protect their own world.

$White Dragon Iona$
…So I thought… since my body is purely made up of the power of memories, maybe if I give the power that holds up my form to all the adventurers, I think it might work. But I will disappear and I won't be able to fight by your side…

${user_nick}$
…What did you just say?
Doesn't that mean you're going to disappear?!
You are going to give your power away to the adventurers and sacrifice yourself?!

$White Dragon Iona${action:Horrified}
…Erm yeah.. No… I mean yeah...
Please don't be so angry. I've already been scolded by the other adventurers….
You can understand why I’m doing this, right? You're a dragon like me…

${user_nick}$
…Don't be angry? How can I not be angry?
Yeah, and I may not be a human. I'm probably a dragon, yeah you're right!

${user_nick}$
Who on earth will take the sacrifice of someone else for granted?!
I can't take it whether you're a human or a dragon.
You asked for my mission just now didn't you? What you're trying to do does not follow my mission! I must stop you!

$White Dragon Iona$
But this is the decision I've made. I've been running away ever since I woke up again and this is the first decision I have made.{user_nick}, my dear fragment of the Ancient Dragon. I have my mission too. I still have Chaos's mission to fulfill. (Iona looks different)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's difficult. Everyone has a different basis for happiness.</html>
<html>Everyone will be happy if you protect them? Nothing will happen if you disappear.</html>
<html>Do you think we will be happy when you disappear?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
[To make everyone in Lagendia happy]
is why Chaos Dragon was born into this world and why it exists.
To keep my mission, I need to disappear for the sake of all the adventurers.
I must protect them and make them happy.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Hehe you're scary. But {user_nick}, if you think about it, the adventurers who can fight will be more helpful than me. I can't really use my powers because I exist to protect this continent. We should choose whatever has the higher chances of winning…

$White Dragon Iona$
…And I won't be gone forever. When all the adventurers who got my power survive from the battle at Monolith and come to Hafling, the power will react with my jewel and I will be resurrected again. That is not against your mission, is it?

$White Dragon Iona$
…Yeah, that is why you must come back alive too. That's the only way I will resurrect and you will fulfill your mission. Please come. And… My mission includes you too, the Ancient Dragon, or the Ancient Dragon's fragment, {user_nick}…

$White Dragon Iona$
…It's ok. You're going to come and find me. I'm used to waiting so don't worry about me.
{user_nick}… My precious Ancient's fragment. I hope you will be happy...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's not your fault. Iona was doing as he pleased.</html>
<html>(Hey Iona… can't you see that he is sad)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian$
{user_nick}? What are you doing here... Oh, you must be one of the adventurers that Iona had met…
What should I do, {user_nick}… Because of me... Iona, he… (Xian seems shocked)

$Warrior Xian$
Whether he is a dragon or not, it's too much to disappear like this. First Geraint, and now Iona too…
Are dragons all the same? Or is it because I'm weak…. (Xian looks tormented)

${user_nick}$
…No that's not it. The dragons only exist for this world...
I think he lent you his powers because he trusted you. And you can meet him again in the future too.
We will meet him again at Hafling when everything ends.

$Warrior Xian$
…Oh yeah… Hafling… He told me to go there after everything is over…
I will go there no matter what and I will see Iona again.
If not... no, I WILL meet him. {user_nick}, you're coming too aren't you?
(Xian looks determined)

${user_nick}$
Yes of course!
(…If the adventurer Iona met is Warrior Xian, then are the other adventurers he met the other Heroes? That means that the history didn't change…? Can't be!)

$Warrior Xian$
…Yes! I thought so.
I'll see you at the battle. Please take care of yourself until then.
Oh, and the Elf Elder seemed to be looking for you.
(Xian looks full of determination. Go to Elf Elder and find out about the situation now.)

$Elf Elder$
Welcome back, {user_nick}. I've heard the news from the messenger from Royal Castle.
Several adventurers including you seem to have warned the King about the danger the Monolith is facing.
…There is no more place to hide. The time has come for your powers to be used, {user_nick}.
Please save your strength until then.

${user_nick}$
… (Iona…. How can you disappear like this. I may have a fragment of Ancient's jewel, but I'm not the Ancient Dragon. Don't interpret it your way. And I know that it's to protect this world, think about my mission too)

${user_nick}$
… (I'm not going to let you off when we meet again… I have so much to ask you and we've only met not long ago… To disappear like this… It just isn't...)
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

${user_nick}$
…(When we have killed the Red Dragon, I will go to Hafling to find you… I promise! )

(You have completed Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend)

journal.title: For Hope 1
journal.contents:
You have decided to go to King Cassius.
Based on the close relationship you've built with him so far, you might be able to convince him.
Go to Saint Haven Royal Castle.

Saint Haven (Inside the Royal Castle) - King Cassius

journal.title: For Hope 2
journal.contents:
While you were trying to convince King Cassius,
Terramai stepped in to help you.
Talk to Cassius a little more.

Saint Haven (Inside the Royal Castle) - King Cassius

journal.title: For Hope 3
journal.contents:
With the help from Terramai and Kayleen, you have successfully convinced King Cassius.
However, Duke Stuart looked unhappy.
Try talking to him.

Saint Haven (Inside the Royal Castle) - Duke Stuart

journal.title: For Hope 4
journal.contents:
You have finished talking to Duke Stuart.
It looked like he was worried that a new hero might be born...
Now talk to Terrence Terramai.

Saint Haven (Inside the Royal Castle) - Terrence Terramai

journal.title: For Hope 5
journal.contents:
Everything went well.
Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance and inform him.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - White Dragon Iona

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Iona at Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance.

journal.title: For Hope 6
journal.contents:
Iona said he has something to tell you and asked you to come to the Forest of Waiting Noon alone.
Go to Forest of Waiting Noon.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon(White Dragon Iona)

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.destination: (Solo) To the Forest of Waiting Noon
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at Forest of Waiting Noon.

journal.title: For Hope 7
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared.
And that guy at the back looks like Warrior Xian…
Try talking to Warrior Xian.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon(Warrior Xian)

journal.title: For Hope 8
journal.contents:
You have arranged your thoughts while talking to Xian.
Now, go to Elf Elder who is in front of Tree of Life Entrance.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Elder
journal.destination: Go to Elf Elder after making the decision

journal.title: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] Completed
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared after leaving all his powers with you.
What is left to do now is to fight Red Dragon Feder at the Monolith.
Come back with victory.

* [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
journal.todo_msg: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
